alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Clay; Early; Miller (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 12:26PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Henry and northeastern Houston Counties in southeastern Alabama, northwestern Miller, southeastern Clay, southwestern Calhoun and Early Counties in southwestern Georgia through 115 PM EDT/1215 PM CDT/... At 1226 PM EDT/1126 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles north of Blakely to Kinsey. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Blakely, Headland, Ashford, Arlington, Webb, Columbia, Douglasville, Centerville, Gordon, Damascus, Jakin, Haleburg, Bluffton, Saffold, Pansey, Sigma, Grandberry Crossroads, Mayhaw, Rock Hill and Barber. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
